content.text: To create a portfolio of AR and VR projects for the company Jetstyle.

The project was made while working at Jetstyle. With the art director I developed the concept of the design, made renders and animations, and then I made up a website. It was interesting to develop the structure of a parallel narrative about two types of projects: augmented and virtual reality.

Every block contains its own mechanics of interaction: in the initial block it’s parallax, in the next ones it’s either an interactive smartphone with AR, or an animation, that is playing while the user is scrolling.
